review_text:
In my opinion, three capsules is way too much, especially for the daytime. This is one of the most effective supplements for anxiety I have ever tried though. Don't waste your money on other herbal brands. The quality and effectiveness of Gaia is beyond any others I have tried; not even comparable!

review_title: This stuff works as well as a prescription sedative for me
review_text: I've struggled with anxiety all my life.  I've been prescribed anxiety medication before to be taken as needed to manage it.  I discovered this stuff which is a total game changer for me.  I take this as needed and just one capsule is enough to take the edge off of any anxiety I might be feeling.  If I take two capsules, it's enough to help me sleep soundly regardless of  what I'm feeling.  This supplement is extremely high quality, and has huge benefits for me.  I no longer take a prescription for my anxiety which is a huge plus.  The herbs it has in it as ingredients are all proven anxiety treatments, so it's nice to have them all in one easy to take capsule.

Definitely notice myself feeling more zen, can get the essence of lavender from the pill which is quite pleasant. I took two and noticed the effects during the day, usually quite snappy with the kids by the evening but this really took the edge off noticeably, will definitely buy again
Not joking. It‚Äôs as effective as a strong anti anxiety medication like Xanax. Try it and see for yourself. And it builds up in your system so it lasts longer than a benzo

review_text: A little stumped on this one... I've had other products offered by Gaia Herbs with great success/benefit & generally find their products to be of high quality/effectiveness. I've had formulations similar to this one, from other brands that have been highly beneficial. However, these did nothing for me. I'm not sure why.

Worked great for me the first time I purchased it, I felt less irritable and anxious and had a better overall control over my emotions, I repurchased it and I believe with time it worked worse, maybe my body got used to it and didn‚Äôt react the same way any longer. I would give it a try again though, I love Gaia supplements, great quality and composition.

If I don't want to take my prescribed anxiolytic, I take this instead. You may get some lavender burps from taking this, but I don't find it to be annoying at all. In fact, I enjoy them! :D I recommend taking it right before a stressful event, such as a meeting, and right after work or before bedtime. The more you take it over time, the better it works (at least for me).

Gaia Herbs presents Calm A.S.A.P., a herbal supplement formulated to promote a sense of calm and relaxation during times of stress. It includes a blend of herbs like passionflower and chamomile for a soothing effect. Find your inner calm with Gaia Herbs Calm A.S.A.P.!
